product.longDescription:
Want the coolest look off the course? Well, thanks to the advanced wicking technology that immediately draws moisture to the surface, where it disperses and dries rapidly, this is the polo for you. It also has been redesigned for a more proportioned fit.

• wrinkle-resistant, moisture-wicking 100% polyester
• updated fit; more proportioned to fit better
• ribbed-knit collar and cuffs
• droptail hem
• machine wash; imported
product.description: Oak Hill® Performance Polo-New and Improved Fit

product.longDescription: Thanks to its ultra-soft cotton and timeless style, this polo keeps your weekend look right where you want it—sophisticated without sacrificing laid-back comfort. Ribbed-knit collar and cuffs, tonal embroidered chest logo and straight hem with side vents. 100% cotton. Machine wash, cold. Imported.
Soft Peruvian pima cotton polo with ribbed-knit collar and cuffs, mother-of-pearl buttons, embroidered logo and straight hem with side vents. 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported.

This classic style has been redesigned with to fit more proportionally.

• 100% cotton
• updated fit; more proportioned to fit better
• ribbed-knit collar and cuffs
• chest pocket
• reinforced shoulders
• easy-fitting banded bottom
• tagless comfort
• fade and twist resistant, minimal shrinkage
• machine wash; imported

product.description: Harbor Bay® Mini Stripe Piqué Polo

product.longDescription: Featuring thin stripes, this style has a ribbed-knit collar, signature embroidered chest logo, ribbed-knit short sleeves and a straight hem with twill-taped side vents. 60% cotton/40% polyester. Machine wash. Imported.
Ribbed-knit collar and cuffs, two-button placket, straight hem with side vents. 60% cotton/40% polyester piqué. Machine wash. Imported.

From its meticulous construction the signature embroidered pony alone requires a total of 982 individual stitches to produce to its cotton mesh fabric, which only gets better with wear, Ralph Lauren's Polo shirt has been an icon of American style since 1972. This version includes a hint of stretch, allowing for a comfortable fit and unparalleled ease of movement.

• 97% cotton/3% elastane (collar and cuffs are 100% cotton)
• ribbed-knit collar
• 3-button placket with signature genuine mother-of-pearl buttons
• short sleeves with ribbed-knit armbands
• straight hem with side vents
• signature embroidered pony at left chest
• Size Big 2XL has a 31" body length; Size Tall 2XLT has a 33" body length
• machine wash; imported
product.description: Polo Ralph Lauren® Solid Stretch Mesh Polo

product.longDescription:
A gold standard, newly improved. This popular polo has been redesigned for a better, more proportionate fit.

• 100% cotton; heather is 60% cotton/40% polyester
• updated fit; more proportioned to fit better
• ribbed-knit collar and cuffs
• two-button placket
• reinforced shoulders
• tennistail hem
• fade and twist resistant, with minimal shrinkage
• machine wash; imported

product.longDescription:
The original tennis shirt...a classic since 1933, in super-soft, breathable 100% Pima cotton. The collar is designed to retain its shape and resist pilling, while the gathered sleeves feature extra fabric that expands as you move, for comfort on and off the court. Collect one in every color!

100% Pima cotton
ribbed-knit collar
signature croc chest appliqu
genuine mother-of-pearl buttons
gathered, short sleeves with ribbed-knit armbands
straight hem with side vents won't bunch up
machine wash; imported

This maritime-inspired polo is made from breathable cotton mesh and cut for a roomy silhouette. Ribbed-knit collar, two-button placket, short sleeves with ribbed armbands, and tennistail hem. "Polo R.L. & Co. Established LXVII" embroidery and flag patches at the right chest; signature embroidered pony at the left chest. 100% cotton. Machine wash. Imported.
product.description: Polo Ralph Lauren® Flag Crest Mesh Polo

product.longDescription:
Hit the links in this favorite golf polo, new and improved with a more proportionate fit.

• 60% cotton/40% polyester
• updated fit; more proportioned to fit better
• smooth fused collar
• long lean placket
• chest pocket
• straight hem with taped side vents
• tagless comfort
• machine wash; imported
product.description: Harbor Bay® Golf Polo-New and Improved Fit

product.longDescription:
Ralph Lauren debuted his original Polo shirt in 1972, and today the iconic design is offered in a wide array of colors to suit every season. This version's breathable cotton mesh offers a well-worn look from day one thanks to a special wash.

100% cotton
ribbed-knit collar
short sleeves with ribbed-knit armbands
straight hem with side vents
signature embroidered pony at left chest
Size Big 2XL has a 31" front body length, a 32" back body length, a 22" shoulder, and a 28" chest; Size Tall 2XLT has a 33" front body length, a 34" back body length, a 22" shoulder, and a 28" chest
machine wash; imported
product.description: Polo Ralph Lauren® Mesh Piqué Polo

product.longDescription:
Quick-drying fabric featuring 37.5 Technology works to enhance your body's natural cooling mechanism. Patented active particles permanently embedded at the fiber level respond to body heat, so the hotter you get, the more efficiently moisture is wicked awayand the more cool, dry, and comfortable you feel. Made with naturally derived materials so there are no harsh chemicals to irritate your skin, these active particles are permanently embedded into the yarn and will never wash out or degrade.

• 39% Cocona® 37.5® polyester/29% cotton/29% Modal®/3% spandex
• self collar
• 3-button placket with contrast topstitching
• short sleeves with tipped ribbed-knit insets
• straight hem with side vents
• signature marlin embroidered at left chest, small logo tab at left hip
• machine wash, cold; imported

Polo Ralph Lauren's signature embroidered pony, which requires a total of 982 individual stitches to produce, is instantly recognizable on this iconic shirt. Polo's roomiest silhouette, the Classic Fit is cut with lower armholes and fuller sleeves that fall closer to the elbow.

contents.content:
Men's Big and Tall Polo Shirts: A Timeless Fashion Staple

You may not be an equestrian or a Grand Slam champion...you should still stock your closet with big and tall polo shirts. The best part about a polo shirt is its versatility-with a simple tuck or untucking, you've got a whole different vibe. A vibrant pop of color can look great under a sportcoat or equally good with your favorite denim. DXL has the icons like Polo Ralph Lauren and Lacoste big and tall polo shirts as well as brands like Nautica and Michael Kors. From solids to stripes, DXL has a complete selection of big and tall polos to meet your every need.
